sentences.en: 2,000 prisoners died as a result of torture and maltreatment.
By giving me this burning torture to bear upon my breast!
sentences.cn: 他让我忍受这胸前灼烧的痛楚!

sentences.en: He died after five days of excruciating torture.
sentences.cn: 遭受了五天的严刑拷打之后，他死了。

sentences.en: It is my understanding that this torture has been going on for many years.
sentences.cn: 据我了解，这种折磨已经持续很多年了。

sentences.en: Many of the refugees have suffered torture.
sentences.cn: 许多难民都遭受过拷打。

sentences.en: No torture would make him speak.
sentences.cn: 任何严刑拷打都不能使他开口.

sentences.en: Political opponents of the regime may be tortured.
sentences.cn: 这个政权的政治异己可能会遭受酷刑。

sentences.en: The confession was a formality, though the torture was real.
sentences.cn: 招供不过是个形式, 但拷打却是货真价实的.

sentences.en: The confessions were obtained by what amounts to torture.
sentences.cn: 这些供状是用近乎逼供的方式得来的。

sentences.en: The idea of being separated from him, even for a few hours, was torture.
sentences.cn: 一想到要和他分开，即便是短短几小时，都感到备受煎熬。

sentences.en: The interrogators put the prisoner to torture.
sentences.cn: 审问者使囚犯们受到折磨.

sentences.en: The police used torture to extort a confession from him.
The report says there is widespread and routine torture of political prisoners in the country.
sentences.cn: 这份报告称该国一直普遍存在折磨政治犯的现象。

sentences.en: The waiting must be torture for you.
sentences.cn: 这样的等待对你来说肯定是一种煎熬。

sentences.en: There are consistent reports of electrical torture being practised on inmates.
sentences.cn: 一直有报道称犯人被施以电刑。

sentences.en: Waiting for the result was torture.
sentences.cn: 等待结果的过程是一种折磨。
